name: sequencer
description: A Node JS tool for building UML sequence diagrams from a JSON or YAML definition

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules; rm -f *.yml; rm -f *.yaml; rm -f *.png; rm -f *.pdf; mv package.json package.json.bak; mv package-lock.json package-lock.json.bak; rm -f *.json; mv package.json.bak package.json; mv package-lock.json.bak package-lock.json;
scripts.examples: cd examples; node ../sequencer.js -y -i example1.yml -o -f; node ../sequencer.js -y -i example2.yml -o -f; node ../sequencer.js -y -i example3.yml -o -f; node ../sequencer.js -y -i example4.yml -o -f;cd ..
scripts.status: npm run build; npm run clean; git status
scripts.push: npm run build; npm run clean; git push; npm install

author: markthepage
